# load the data

```{r}
library(data.table)

# load one file

# temp <- fread(file="data/KI_03.dat")


# load all files
file_names <- list.files("data/")

all_data <- data.frame()
for(i in file_names){
 temp_data <- fread(file=paste("data/",i,sep = ""))
 all_data <- rbind(all_data, temp_data)
}
```
